CustomField.description: Indicates that a donor has left a gift to QUT in their Will. This is captured during the online donation transaction process. QUT may already know about this gift from prior engagement, or it could be a new opportunity to follow up.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates that a donor has left a gift to QUT in their Will. This is captured during the online donation transaction process. QUT may already know about this gift from prior engagement, or it could be a new opportunity to follow up.
CustomField.label: QUT Included in Will
